summary: Vivid Semi-Realistic "Fantasy" Preset with Lot of Customization (ENB Filters and LUTS) + SweetFX. Vanilla/NLA/CoT
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Verdana][size=4][color=#e69138]﻿﻿Requirements[/color]
[/size][/font][/b][size=2][url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]ENB Series 0.314 or later[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]Skyrim ENB Helper
[/url][/size][b]
[font=Verdana][color=#e69138][size=4]Install[/size][/color][/font][/b][size=2][url=http://www.dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]
[/url][/size][color=#fff2cc][b]1.[/b] [/color][font=Arial]Download and install the latest enb to your skyrim main folder where the TESV.exe is located. (enbhost.exe and d3d9.dll)[/font]
[b][color=#fff2cc]2. [/color][/b][font=Arial]Copy the preset in your skyrim main folder.[/font]
[b][color=#fff2cc]3[/color].[/b][font=Arial] Edit or add the following settings in the SkyrimPrefs.ini.:[/font]
[font=Arial][Display][/font]
[font=Arial]fGamma=1.0000[/font]
[font=Arial]iMultiSample=0[/font]
[font=Arial]bTransparencyMultisampling=0[/font]
[font=Arial]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1[/font]
[font=Arial]bDrawShadows=1[/font]
[font=Arial]bDrawLandShadows=1[/font]
[font=Arial]bTreesReceiveShadows=1[/font]
[font=Arial]bShadowsOnGrass=1[/font]
[font=Arial]bDeferredShadows=1[/font]
[i]Turn off Anti-Aliasing (or set to "Application-Controlled") in your graphics driver control panel.
[/i][color=#fff2cc][b]4.[/b][/color][font=Arial] Edit your enblocal.ini:[/font]
[font=Arial][PROXY][/font]
[font=Arial]EnableProxyLibrary=true[/font]
[font=Arial]InitProxyFunctions=true[/font]
[font=Arial]ProxyLibrary=SWEETFXd3d9.dll[/font]

[b][color=#fff2cc]>>> SCREENSHOT KEY= F10[/color][/b]
[font=Arial]You can change this in the injector.ini or download:[/font]
[url=http://sweetfx.thelazy.net/]SweetFX Configurator[/url][font=Arial] [/font]
[size=4][b]
[font=Verdana][color=#e69138]Features[/color][/font]
[/b][/size][font=Arial]Weather FX shader, 9 Different LUTs, 2 Different Tonemapping, Filters: Retro, Clarity, Positive & Negative.[/font]
[b][color=#b4a7d6]Supported Plugins[/color][/b]
[font=Arial][spoiler][/font]
[font=Arial]Aether Suite[/font]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84946/?]Bruma[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48467/?]Beyond Reach[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]CoT[/url]
[font=Arial]Dawnguard[/font]
[font=Arial]Dragonborn[/font]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]ELFX[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/?]NLA[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90276]P.AHO[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77510/?]Glenmoril[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64651/?]Gray Cowl[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87681]Maslea[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67103/?]Vigilant[/url]
[font=Arial]Vanilla Skyrim Lighting/Weather Replacer[/font]
[font=Arial][/spoiler][/font]
[b][color=#b4a7d6]Required / Recommened Mods[/color][/b]
[font=Arial][spoiler][/font]
[list]
[*][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065]NLA[/url][font=Arial] (esp only) [/font][/b][font=Arial][color=#999999]or[/color] [/font][b][font=Arial][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/]CoT[/url]﻿ (default experience)[/font][/b]
[/list][list]
[*][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043]ELFX[/url][font=Arial] (core files only - no interior or exterior)[/font][/b]
[*][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59809]Vivid Clouds and Fogs[/url][/b]
[*][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68496]Real Skyrim Snowflake[/url][/b]
[*][url=https://mega.nz/#!zst1XQYB!rj7xw6EynlGNXMSsEVKp-k7Y0Ut4avGQKBBcTEOroY0][b]Skyrim Particle Patch For ENB[/b][/url]
[/list][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88676]Obsidian Mountain Fog[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63478]True Storms[/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87139]
Dark Forests of Skyrim[/url] ([url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88162/]David's Trees Edition[/url])
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86077]The Blue Forest[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91775/]Trees Addon[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55699/]Immersive Fallen Trees[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84044/]The Ruins Legendary[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62425/]Embers HD

[/url]NLA & ELFX were used for the screenshots.
[font=Arial][/spoiler][/font]
[b][color=#b4a7d6]Customization[/color][/b]
[font=Arial]The following are some of the adjustable settings in the ENB GUI which opens by pressing [b][color=#ffe599]Shift+Enter[/color][/b] keys.[/font]
[font=Arial](The GUI hotkey may differ depending on your enblocal.ini [INPUT] settings.)
[/font]To find the filters open the [b][color=#ffe599]enbeffect.fx[/color][/b] dropdown menu which is located in the shader parameters window.
If the shader parameters window is not visible (closed) you can activate it at the top of the enbseries.ini panel.
From here you can change:
[b][color=#ffe599]Interior:[/color][/b] 
Brightness / Gamma / Black and White Level / Saturation / Color Balance
[b][color=#ffe599]Exterior:[/color][/b]
Brightness (Day and Night) / Gamma / Black and White Level / Saturation / Color Balance
[color=#ffe599][b]Filters:
[/b][/color][b]Tonemapping:[/b] Reinhard, Filmic
[b]Retro:[/b] High Contrast, Darker Look
[b]Clarity:[/b] Cleaner and Brighter Look[center][img]https://image.ibb.co/mqLVne/filt.jpg[/img]﻿[/center][b]Color Temperature: [/b](+) Positive, (-) Negative[center][img]https://image.ibb.co/jVAKfz/temp.jpg[/img]﻿[/center][b]LUT Type:[/b] 1-9[center][img]https://image.ibb.co/is637e/luts.jpg[/img]﻿[/center][b]Poster Effect: [/b]Located in enbeffectprepass.fx
[center][img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/066469e9c0901b8bbeb408b419a8bdae/tumblr_pe4h70hYC71wyg3ayo1_1280.jpg[/img]﻿[/center][size=2][i][color=#cccccc][center]If you happy with the changes you made don't forget to save it, unless you only changed the enbs look for some screenshots.[/center][/color][/i][b][font=Verdana][color=#e69138][size=4]Troubleshooting[/size][/color][/font][/b]
[/size][spoiler]
It crashes the game before it starts.
Install [url=https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=35]DirectX End-User Runtime[/url] if you don't have it.
It is reported that Windows Update may reset installations of some runtime components. In this case, it should be solved by reinstalling the runtime.

Flickering at Night
Disable Occlusion Culling in enblocal.ini
EnableOcclusionCulling=false

Install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72725/?]Crash Fixes[/url] and configure CrashFixPlugin.ini settings. Instructions are included in the ini itself.
For instance, if you have experienced a crash on ShowRaceMenu, try setting AlignHeapAllocate to 1.

It crashes when the game tries to load exterior cells.
It is reported that the following setting solved it.
[FIX]
FixParallaxTerrain=false

Nights and/or Interiors too dark.
Open ENB GUI (Shift+Enter) and change the brightness in the enbeffect.fx dropdown menu.
Or try different LUT type
Or try different Tonemapping
[/spoiler]
[font=Arial][color=#6fa8dc][b][size=2]Performance[/size]
[/b][/color][/font][spoiler]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wkJBDEDDS5o&list=LL7wq8iLCgylUeAnu5Kf60_w&index=20&t=0s]Windows 10 Performance Boost[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12801]Ordenador [/url](Texture Downsize)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859]Tes5Edit[/url]﻿ (Clean Plugins)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69787]BethINI [/url](Smart Settings Tweaks)
- If you experience stuttering lower your Distant Object Details.
[b][color=#ffe599]Performance Mods:[/color][/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32505]Skyrim Project Optimalization[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6387]Skyrim Performance Plus[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60603]Unofficial Enhanced Lights and FX Performance Patch[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56112]Remove Little Rocks[/url]﻿
[/spoiler]
